definition: A medical procedure that involves introducing a substance into the body to stimulate the immune system and protect against specific diseases. It is commonly used to prevent the spread of infectious diseases and is administered through injections or oral doses.

examples.german: Die Impfung wird in den Oberarm gespritzt.
examples.english: The vaccination is injected into the upper arm.

examples.german: Die Impfung ist für Kinder ab einem Jahr empfohlen.
examples.english: The vaccination is recommended for children from one year onwards.
The vaccination can have side effects.

examples.german: Die Impfung muss regelmäßig aufgefrischt werden.
examples.english: The vaccination needs to be refreshed regularly.
